claim: Cancer can be prevented by not doing drugs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: ONDCP 's view is that `` drug addiction is a disease that can be successfully prevented and treated ... making drugs more available will make it harder to keep our communities healthy and safe '' .

claim: Cancer can be prevented by not doing drugs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: CUSP9 is related several other trials using a similar conceptual approach : The COMBAT regimen for treating various advanced pediatric cancers that uses two re-purposed non-cytotoxic drugs to augment two traditional cytotoxic drugs , or the GLAD regimen that uses one traditional anti-cancer drug , gefitinib , with three re-purposed non-cancer drugs .

claim: Cancer can be prevented by not doing drugs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: CUSP9 -LSB- Coordinated Undermining of Survival Paths -RSB- is one of several cancer treatment protocols using re-purposed older drugs to interfere with cancer cell 's growth signaling rather than directly killing them with cytotoxic drugs .

claim: Cancer can be prevented by not doing drugs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The ReDO project and many others -LSB- 7 -RSB- also follow this line of thought as in CUSP9 - repurposing older drugs for their anti-cancer effect and simultaneous use of several of them -RSB- in cancer treatment .

claim: Cancer can be prevented by not doing drugs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Chemotherapy  (  often abbreviated to chemo and sometimes CTX or CTx  )  is a category of cancer treatment that uses one or more anti-cancer drugs  (  chemotherapeutic agents  )  as part of a standardized chemotherapy regimen .
